text: Always no Halo- Halo, I ordered Ube cake it was so dry I just wasted $35 for that cake.. Pandesal is good though...
great Filipino desserts, baked goods and kakanin... empanada is good too... great alternative to existing  Filipino restos

Great authentic Filipino baked goods at an amazing price!  I have come here twice, with different varieties of baked goods each time. I love filipino food that hasn't been infiltrated with attempts at making itself more North American- this is it!
